actions.Name: Steel Fangs
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Honed Steel Potency: 300
Additional Effect: Grants Honed Reavers
Honed Reavers Effect: Increases potency of Reaving Fangs by 100 and Reaving Maw by 20
Duration: 60s
Effect cannot be stacked with Honed Steel.

actions.Name: Reaving Fangs
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Honed Reavers Potency: 300
Additional Effect: Grants Honed Steel
Honed Steel Effect: Increases potency of Steel Fangs by 100 and Steel Maw by 20
Duration: 60s
Effect cannot be stacked with Honed Reavers.

actions.Name: Steel Maw
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Honed Steel Potency: 120
Additional Effect: Grants Honed Reavers
Honed Reavers Effect: Increases potency of Reaving Fangs by 100 and Reaving Maw by 20
Duration: 60s
Effect cannot be stacked with Honed Steel.

actions.Name: Reaving Maw
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Honed Reavers Potency: 120
Additional Effect: Grants Honed Steel
Honed Steel Effect: Increases potency of Steel Fangs by 100 and Steel Maw by 20
Duration: 60s
Effect cannot be stacked with Honed Reavers.

actions.Name: Vicewinder
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 500.
Additional Effect: Grants a Rattling Coil, up to a maximum of 3
Maximum Charges: 2
Shares a recast timer with Vicepit.

actions.Name: Hunter's Coil
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 570.
620 when executed from a target's flank.
Additional Effect: Grants Hunter's Instinct
Hunter's Instinct Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 40s
Additional Effect: Grants Hunter's Venom
Hunter's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinfang Bite by 50
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5
Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Bite, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Bite.
These actions can be executed a total of two times following Hunter's Coil.
Can only be executed after successfully landing Vicewinder or Swiftskin's Coil.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Swiftskin's Coil
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 570.
620 when executed from a target's rear.
Additional Effect: Grants Swiftscaled
Swiftscaled Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%
Duration: 40s
Additional Effect: Grants Swiftskin's Venom
Swiftskin's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinblood Bite by 50
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5
Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Bite, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Bite.
These actions can be executed a total of two times following Swiftskin's Coil.
Can only be executed after successfully landing Vicewinder or Hunter's Coil.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Vicepit
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 220 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants a Rattling Coil, up to a maximum of 3
Maximum Charges: 2
Shares a recast timer with Vicewinder.

actions.Name: Hunter's Den
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Hunter's Instinct
Hunter's Instinct Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 40s
Additional Effect: Grants Fellhunter's Venom
Fellhunter's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinfang Thresh by 30
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5
Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Thresh, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Thresh.
These actions can be executed a total of two times following Hunter's Den.
Can only be executed after Vicepit or Swiftskin's Den.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Swiftskin's Den
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Swiftscaled
Swiftscaled Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%
Duration: 40s
Additional Effect: Grants Fellskin's Venom
Fellskin's Venom Effect: Increases potency of Twinblood Thresh by 30
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Increases Serpent Offerings Gauge by 5
Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Twinfang Thresh, and Twinblood changes to Twinblood Thresh.
These actions can be executed a total of two times following Swiftskin's Den.
Can only be executed after Vicepit or Hunter's Den.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Reawaken
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 750 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Anguine Tribute
Duration: 30s
Serpent Offerings Gauge Cost: 50

actions.Name: Writhing Snap
actions.Description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 200.

actions.Name: Uncoiled Fury
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 680 to the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Poised for Twinfang
Poised for Twinfang Effect: Increases the potency of Uncoiled Twinfang by 50
Duration: 60s
Upon successfully landing this action, Twinfang changes to Uncoiled Twinfang, and Twinblood changes to Uncoiled Twinblood.
These actions can be executed a total of two times.
Rattling Coil Cost: 1
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Slither
actions.Description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.
Maximum Charges: 3
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Serpent's Ire
actions.Description:
Grants one stack of Rattling Coil.
Grants Ready to Reawaken.
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while in combat.

actions.Name: Serpent's Tail
actions.Description: Changes to Death Rattle, Last Lash, First Legacy, Second Legacy, Third Legacy, or Fourth Legacy when requirements for execution are met.

actions.Name: Twinfang
actions.Description: Changes to Twinfang Bite, Twinfang Thresh, or Uncoiled Twinfang when requirements for execution are met.

actions.Name: Twinblood
actions.Description: Changes to Twinblood Bite, Twinblood Thresh, or Uncoiled Twinblood when requirements for execution are met.

actions.Name: Bloodcoil
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.
Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP

※Action changes to Sanguine Feast upon execution.

actions.Name: Uncoiled Fury
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 4,000.
Potency is doubled when attacking only a single target.
Maximum Charges: 2
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Serpent's Tail
actions.Description: Changes to Death Rattle, Twinfang Bite, Twinblood Bite, Uncoiled Twinfang, Uncoiled Twinblood, First Legacy, Second Legacy, Third Legacy, or Fourth Legacy when requirements for execution are met.

actions.Name: Slither
actions.Description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.
Additional Effect: Increases movement speed by 25%
Duration: 4s
Maximum Charges: 2
Unable to cast if bound.

actions.Name: Snake Scales
actions.Description:
Grants Hardened Scales, changing Snake Scales to Backlash.
Hardened Scales Effect: Reduces damage taken by 50% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Armored Scales to self, creating a barrier that nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 4,000 potency
Duration: 4s
Grants Snake's Bane when barrier is completely absorbed.
Waiting 4s or executing Backlash while under the effect of Hardened Scales delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies within 5 yalms.
Range is increased by 15 yalms and potency is doubled for enemies within 5 yalms while under the effect of Snake's Bane.
Unable to move while under the effect of Hardened Scales.

actions.Name: Rattling Coil
actions.Description:
Resets the recast timer for Uncoiled Fury and Snake Scales.
Recast time is reduced by 10s upon earning a kill or an assist.

actions.Name: World-swallower
actions.Description:
Delivers a jumping physical attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 12,000.
Additional Effect: Grants Reawakened and increases movement speed by 25%
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Noxious Gnash
Noxious Gnash Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 20%
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Heavy +75%
Duration: 5s
Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.
Gauge Charge Time: 90s

※Dual Fang Combo changes to First Generation while under the effect of Reawakened.
※Bloodcoil changes to Ouroboros while under the effect of Reawakened.
